text: is a Japanese former cyclist. He competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics and 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Japan Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Osaka Prefecture Category:Asian Games medalists in cycling Category:Cyclists at the 1978 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1978 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Japan
title: Yoshikazu Cho
